entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain mixed with snow beginning this evening then changing to snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023
